channel.title: Devices on Nomad's reflections
channel.description: Recent content in Devices on Nomad's reflections

item.title: Apple Vision Pro for a regular prosumer
item.description: Once the Apple Vision Pro became available I instantly ordered it to test out 3 use cases: work monitor: use headset to be able to work in any place/condition with a comfortable large monitor gaming device: use headset as a streaming gaming platform anywhere personal IMAX: use headset to have unmatched movie-viewing experience anywhere. I’ve been using it on and off for about 3 weeks now. This post summarizes how it went for me.

item.title: Garmin fenix 6s vs Apple watch 4.
item.description: My series 4 apple watch was purchased something like 4 years ago, just to help with running. With the release of the new Ultra and the battery on my trusty friend starting to show signs of wear, I was seriously considering an upgrade. That was, until a great deal on a Garmin 6s watch swooped in and I “took a bite”. This post serves as a recount my personal experience with the two, since they are truly different devices.
